info.name: К.форум.мт5
info.description:
A dark background theme for forum.mt5.com around original red colors.
Initial theme made for Bulgaria-Forex.com, blueish-green scale changed with red to suite this one.
Should work as long as vBulletin version is around 4.0.8.
info.additionalInfo:
You can change any of the colors with bulk find and replace in most text editors. 
Relevant colors are:
Grey backgrounds: most used #404040 #373737 #303030 less used #525252
Text: most used #cecece #f4f4f4 #ececec #ffffff less used #777 #999 #aaa #bbb #000
Red scale: #51000d #9D001A #ff1d42 #ffb7c2 #ff9dad #ff6a82 #ff032d #b6001e
